original: Beskow, Hans Axel Allan, sanatorieläkare, Romanäs, f. 7/10/01 i Sthlm av kontr iprosten, teol. dr Emanuel B. 0. Nanna Hildebrand. G. 27 m. Eline Fenger-Krog. Barn: Leif f. 30, Jan 31, Gun 36, Kerstin 42, Ann 45. — Stud:ex. i Borås 20, med. kand. i Upps. 25 o. med. hc. där 30. Studires. t. Tyskl. Aman. v. fysiolog, inst. i Upps. 24-25, assist :läk. v. Akad. sjukh. kir. kHn. 28, e. läk. v. Sätra brunn 30, div. förordn. v. Akad. sjukh. samt Romanäs o. Löts sanat. 30-32, und:läk. v. Österåsens sanat. 32-35, v. Umeå las. med. avd. 35-37, överläk. v. Romanäs sanat. sed. 37. Skr.: upps. i fysiol. o. inv. med., spec. tuberkuloslära.
translated: Beskow, Hans Axel Allan, sanatorium physician, Romanäs, born on October 7th, 1901 in Stockholm to district chaplain, theology doctor Emanuel B. and Nanna Hildebrand. Married on May 27th with Eline Fenger-Krog. Children: Leif born in 1930, Jan born in 1931, Gun born in 1936, Kerstin born in 1942, and Ann born in 1945. He completed his high school studies in Borås in 1920, obtained his Bachelor of Medicine degree in Uppsala in 1925, and his licentiate degree in medicine from the same university in 1930. He studied as a German scholarship student in 1924-25, worked as an assistant physician at the Academical Hospital surgical clinic in 1928, as a resident physician at Sätra brunn in 1930, and had various appointments to the Academical Hospital, Romanäs and Löts sanatoriums from 1930-1932. He worked as a junior physician at Österåsens sanatorium between 1932-1935, and at Umeå County Hospital's medical department between 1935-1937, before becoming the head physician at Romanäs sanatorium from 1937. He has written works on physiology and internal medicine, with a special focus on tuberculosis.
